content.title: Initiatives
content.visibleText:
TeachTap Marketing Plan - Q3 2024

Goal
Initiatives

1. Parent-Focused Marketing
Goal: Increase conversions by targeting parents as decision-makers
Build a commerce-enabled landing page for parents to pay and invite their children to download TeachTap
Develop parent-specific messaging highlighting the value of TeachTap for their child's academic success
Incorporate expert testimonials (such as Sam on how much he charges, time to get a student to a 1,500 SAT score, his insights and strategies are baked into TeachTap's AI so that students have access to all the best tips and tricks that you could otherwise only get from high end tutors at $200/hour)
Test various marketing channels to reach parents effectively (e.g., social media, email, paid ads)

2. Improved Online Customer Acquisition
Goal: Increase conversion rates through targeted messaging and cohort-specific landing pages
Define specific student and parent cohorts based on their needs, preferences, and behaviors
Create tailored messaging for each cohort, highlighting TeachTap's unique value proposition

activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in reading and editing a Google Docs document titled 'TeachTap Marketing Plan - Q3 2024'. The document outlines various marketing initiatives, including 'Parent-Focused Marketing' and 'Improved Online Customer Acquisition'. Additionally, the user has visited 'loom.com', which is a platform for video messaging and screen recording. This implies that the user might be reviewing or sharing video content, possibly related to the marketing initiatives or team updates. The specific links visited on Loom suggest that the user is accessing shared videos, which could be part of the marketing strategy discussions or presentations.
